article_title: New Year, New Tax Rules: What You Need to Know
article_text:
A new year usually brings tax changes, and 2016 is no exception.

The good news is that last month, in the nick of time, Congress enacted permanent extensions of several popular provisions, including the American Opportunity tax credit, a higher-education benefit; the IRA charitable transfer provision for people 70 1/2 and older; certain mass-transit benefits; a child tax credit; and the ability to deduct state sales taxes instead of...
